original_title:
🚨 BREAKING: DHS is considering buying their OWN fleet of airplanes to rapidly increase the rate of deportation flights, per NBC
  — The Donald
article_summary: DHS is considering purchasing its own fleet of airplanes to increase deportation flights, sparking debate on whether to use military planes or reactivate retired commercial aircraft. Suggestions include remote piloting, using Starlink, and even installing ejection seats to reduce costs.</s>
